title: Spice Paradise: Curry Meshi Ver.
synopsis: Nissin Foods' Curry Meshi instant curry rice brand opened an official website for the newest wave of its collaboration with The IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls on Thursday. Positive Passion idols Mio Honda, Aiko Takamori, and Akane Hino perform the new song
related_anime: ['The iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls: Anytime, Anywhere with Cinderella.', 'Curry Meshi x Zombieland Saga']
